content.question: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A, B, C, and D. Describe the broader historical context of Wells’s speech.Describe one piece of evidence Wells provides in her speech to support her claim that Southern states have destroyed the rights of African Americans.Describe a strategy used by African Americans in the late nineteenth and early twentieth century to promote racial uplift.Explain how the discriminatory practices described in the excerpt were challenged by African American activists in the second half of the twentieth century.

frqParts.text: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A, B, C, and D. skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
